data.name: Animal Wish
data.detailed_description:
"Animal wish" is a game with popular mechanics, as well-known as "3 in a row".
If you have long dreamed of taking a break from the hustle and bustle of the city or becoming a real farmer for one day, enjoying the gifts of nature, then welcome to the animal farm!
Here you will feel a real unity with nature and will be able to get to know the farm animals better.
The way you used to imagine a cute cow or sheep is nothing compared to our farm!
We are ready to bet that you will be delighted and will be able to experience new facets of the possible!
There are 8 animals on the farm: pig, cat, turkey, dog, sheep, chicken, cow.
Take a break from all your affairs, try to meet girls, understand their nature, show attention and make friends!
Of course, each animal has its own temper and charisma. As an experienced farmer, you should be able to find an approach to everyone.
Will you be able to gain confidence and tame the bestial temper? Can you become a real leader of your tribe?
If you are ready to test your strength, then charming animal girls are waiting for you!


Features:
- 64 levels
- 8 charming girls
- a bright and unique gallery.

data.short_description: If you have long dreamed of taking a break from the hustle and bustle of the city or becoming a real farmer for one day, enjoying the gifts of nature, then welcome to the animal farm!
data.supported_languages:
English, French, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7/i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT750
  • Storage: 1750 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity or sexual content
- Not suitable for watching at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters are over 18 years of age
